::Shadow Wing::

She heard his thoughts about not using it before on a protoform. "YOU 
WHAT!?!?, You never used it on...Oh no." she mentally sighed in 
frustration. "And you said it spread until it wiped them out? And you 
want to put that in me? Oh no...No way. I am not going to run the 
risk of infecting..." she stopped as the protoform shivered.  It was 
coming out of stasis lock.  She woke up and opened her eyes.  She 
took a deep breath and felt the air fill her lungs.  She just layed 
there, breathing and with her eyes open. She thought, "Veratis, what 
did you do to me?" She could tell that Veratis was nervious, and that 
wasn't helping her own fears any.  She felt herself shake, she felt 
cold.  The white fur was still growing and the wings on her back were 
developing into huge wings with white feathers.  She could feel her 
skin crawl as it developed and started to form over her protoform.
She tried not to cry, but she couldn't understand what or why this 
was happening toher.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Veratis didn't know what to expect, he didn't expect yes from 
Shadow 
> Wing that much was for sure. "The last time I used the virus was on 
> insecticons. It nullified thier ability to communicate. The virus 
> eventually spread until they were wiped out." he wasn't afraid for 
> her at the moment, he was afraid of the effects that would occur if 
> it spread through her telepathy.
> 
> "If I give you a small dose it should weaken your telepathy, I just 
> don't know what other effects it may have."
>  He didn't have to say it but the biggest thought going through his 
> mind was that he'd never used the virus on a protoform.
